column4: ugotserved : .... i have no idea what i'm doing in linux : obviously lol ... so i'm just learning ... just want to get the win7 and ubuntu dual booting with grub
What version of Ubuntu are you using? What is the output of "sudo os-prober"? Can you pastebin your /boot/grub/grub.cfg ?
... it's the latest version 11.10 ... I can try and find the pastebin and do that ... there was no output from "sudo os-prober"
